thread.title: then destroy still triggers after lock scripts

comments.text: enabling lock scripts in menu wont stop objects from being destroyed if they have "when starts then destroy all parts"
i cannot finish a big project of mine because of this...
thanks for the note! the lock normally only affects editing, not scripts, but we could change that. i presume the "stop scripts" me option fails, can you explain some more pls?
